name: Dodge Ball: Random Infinity
description:
Dodge Ball is an arcade game in which you have to score the maximum number of points and rounds dodging red balls and attacking cubes.

Collect coins that will appear on the playing field.

- Blue coins give game points.

- Red coins are a transition to a new round.

The red coins indicate a safe place to move to dodge the special attack of the cubes, but be careful the enemy balls don't stop!

Features of Dodge Ball

• The game has no end

• Simple and intuitive control

• Continuously accelerating balls

• Each new round is a challenge for the player

• Cubes have more than 25 types of attacks
